promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic mythical goat grass-type pokemon wearing a dark crystal headband. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Caprysta, a a dynamic mythical goat grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Jumping Side Kick. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "grass" or "Caprysta". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, goat-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald galaxy background
generatedDescription: This lively, mythical creature thrives in dense foliage, using its powerful legs to perform astounding side kicks whilst bounding between branches.
